analysis.name: SOLIDITY_VISIBILITY
analysis.content: functionupdatePrice(uinttime_interval)payable{require(now<=endDate);if(oraclize_getPrice("URL")>this.balance){emitLogNewOraclizeQuery("Oraclize query was NOT sent, please add some ETH to cover for the query fee");}else{emitLogNewOraclizeQuery("Oraclize query was sent, standing by for the answer..");oraclize_query(time_interval,"URL","json(https://api.gdax.com/products/ETH-USD/ticker).price");}}
